medical officer.
3.1.2.3  Example: Pregnant women with high blood pressure or GDM, or Syphilis can be referred to a PHC or 
a CHC with MBBS Medical Officer or for PMSMA.
3.1.2.4 All the high-risk pregnant women should be referred to higher facility with a properly filled referral slip, 
which will help in identifying the complication for which the pregnant women has been referred for, the 
treatment given so far and help needed.
